Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game.GameUpdateListener
public class Controller extends Object implements Game.GameUpdateListener
This is the main controller for the server. There's only 1 instance throughout the server. This controller handles all the general requests like registering nicknames, listing games, joining games... All the other requests regarding games are handled instead by the GameController.

  • Method Details

    • registerNickname

      public GameController registerNickname(String nickname) throws DuplicatedNicknameException, NicknameNotValidException
      Register nickname of a player. This method must be called as soon as a player connects to this server.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      nickname -
      Returns:
      the gameController if this player was in a game before disconnecting, null otherwise
      Throws:
      DuplicatedNicknameException - if the nickname is already in use by another player
      NicknameNotValidException - if the nickname does not meet all the criteria

    • listGames

      public List<GameListItem> listGames()
      Obtain a list of all the games available in this server. Only the games not started yet and with enough space are returned
      Returns:
      the list of games

    • joinGame

      public GameController joinGame(String nickname, UUID uuid)
      Join the specified game
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player playing this action
      uuid - of the game to join
      Returns:
      the GameController needed to control this game

    • createGame

      public GameController createGame(String nickname, int numberOfPlayers, boolean expertMode)
      Create a new game
      Parameters:
      nickname - client nickname
      numberOfPlayers - number of player desired for this game
      expertMode - whether the game will use expert rules
      Returns:
      the GameController needed to control this game

    • onGameUpdate

      public void onGameUpdate(Game game)
      This callback is called for every game on this server. If a game finishes this will be removed from the list
      Specified by:
      onGameUpdate in interface Game.GameUpdateListener
      Parameters:
      game -

    • isRegistered

      public boolean isRegistered(String nickname)
      Check if a nickname is registered, in other words if it is associated with a nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the client nickname
      Returns:
      true if the virtual view is registered, false otherwise
